title: Mori Carta
description: Deceptively simple controls : Almost every interaction in the game is handled with a simple swipe left or right. Engaging story: Adventure with a colorful cast of characters that accompany you on your adventures. Rich depth of builds and combos: Choosing cards to add to your deck will be critical in surviving your adventures. With over 1000 cards, the combinations are endless. Vibrant Venture

system_requirements.Graphics: 2 Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
